title: Make channel order consistent between nn.Conv*  and nn.functional.conv*
body_html: Right now, nn.Conv* is In channels x Out channels, while nn.functional.conv* is Out channels x In channels. I'd be great if we could just pick one format for both. Personally, I prefer In x Out but I think consistency is more important. Since this would be breaking, seems like a good thing to fix before 1.0
body_text: Right now, nn.Conv* is In channels x Out channels, while nn.functional.conv* is Out channels x In channels. I'd be great if we could just pick one format for both. Personally, I prefer In x Out but I think consistency is more important. Since this would be breaking, seems like a good thing to fix before 1.0
body: Right now, nn.Conv* is `In channels x Out channels`, while nn.functional.conv* is `Out channels x In channels`. I'd be great if we could just pick one format for both. Personally, I prefer `In x Out` but I think consistency is more important. Since this would be breaking, seems like a good thing to fix before 1.0
